results.title: The Blue kite
results.brief_description: The fate of a Beijing family under Mao Tse Tung’s regime from the early 1950’s to the Cultural Revolution is the focus of this film by talented filmaker Tian Zhuangzhuang. Seen from the perspective of Tietou who grows from child to adolescence as he observes his mother’s three marriages. Although epic in proportion, the intimacy of domestic life is a poignant contrast to the political dramas occuring. The film was banned in China but a print was smuggled out of the country allowing the rest of the world an opportunity to experience this inspirational human drama.

results.title: The Black swan
results.creator_credit: Henry King, Robert Bassler and Twentieth Century-Fox Film Corporation
results.brief_description: This is the story of the Spanish Main - when villainy wore a sash and the only political creed in the world was - Love, Gold and Adventure! Tyrone Power is a swashbucking rogue pirate who pillages galleons and towns in the company of Henry Morgan (Laird Cregar). When Morgan is elected Govenor of Jamaica, some of his pirate Captains continue their villainous ways, especially Redbeard (George Sanders). Power falls in love with the beautiful daughter (Maureen O’Hara) of the former Govenor and decides to reform which pits him against Redbeard. “The Black Swan” is a classic of its kind, with magnificent settings, swordplay, bravura acting and excitingly staged action sequences involving 17th Century ships and an enormous amount of cannon fire! Leon Shamroy’s cinematography deservedly earned him an Oscar. Based on the novel by Rafael Sabatini.

results.title: Best of friends
results.creator_credit: Ian Munro, Film Australia and ABC-TV (Australia)
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Johnson and friends”.
Six stories featuring the courageous pink elephant and his friends who amongst the clutter in Michael’s bedroom. The stories are: “Beginnings”, “Under the bed”, “Best of friends”, “The Thing outside”, “Helpless”, and “Moving house”.

results.title: The Black Stallion Returns
results.creator_credit: Robert Dalva, Francis Ford Coppola, Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer and Zoetrope Studios
results.brief_description: A youth named Alec and a fabled Arabian steed survived a shipwreck and became inseparable friends in The Black Stallion, the first of Walter Farley’s 16-book series to be made into a highly successful film. In the sequel The Black Stallion returns, the horse is reclaimed by its rightful owner, beginning an odyssey to North Africa and a culture alien to Alec. Through his persistence, Alec gains new insights into courage, perseverance and honour. This action-filled adventure tale joins the initial film as a timeless classic. Stars Kelly Reno and Ferdy Mayne

results.title: The Birthday present
results.creator_credit: Ian Munro, Film Australia and ABC-TV (Australia)
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Johnson and friends”.
Johnson, a courageous pink elephant, leads his friends on a series of adventures. He is joined by Alfred, a leaky hot-water bottle, McDuff, a cheeky concertina, Diesel the dump truck and Squeaky the battered robot. The stories on this tape include: “The Birthday present”, “Playing games”, “Sharing”, “The Picnic”, “Windchimes” and “Cleaning day”.

results.title: The Black death, 1361
results.creator_credit: Leo Eaton, Altug Savasal, Diane Holmes and Maryland Public Television
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Timeline”.
A dramatic recreation of the social upheaval experienced in the Middle Ages due to the spread of the Black Death. Modelled on a news broadcast, the program looks at the causes and impact of the Plague, and “interviews” key historical figures of the time. At its most virulent, the disease decimated both city and rural populations and created severe labour shortages.

results.title: Timeline
results.creator_credit: Leo Eaton, Maryland Public Television and Holmes Associates
results.brief_description: Timeline is an innovative series for schools presenting historical events in a newscast format. The focus of the series is on events which occured in the Middle Ages.

results.title: Dinosaur tracks
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Johnson and friends”.
Johnson and his friends get together in six stories. In “Diesel tries to fly” all the toys are put in danger as Diesal tries out his wings. Squeaky’s good at guarding the bedroom but what about the “Dinosaur tracks”? Is Johnson falling apart as the toys follow the mysterious “Pink thread.” “Melissa’s dinosaur”, Victoria is introduced to the toys. In “Diesel who?”, the toy loses his memory after a nasty crash. McDuff feels very superior after a visit to the toyshop, and the toys try to get her back to her old self in The Homecoming.

results.title: Buried treasure
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Johnson and friends”.
Johnson, the courageous pink elephant, leads his friends in 6 new stories. 1. “Baby of the family” Squeaky, the battered robot, was the baby of the toyroom, but also the strongest. How can the others protect her from dangerous games? 2. “The big freeze” It was the coldest day ever in Michael’s bedroom, so how will the toys get warm? 3. “Secrets” McDuff, the cheeky concertina, has a secret and all the other toys are desperate to know what it is. 4. “Operation Squeaky” Squeaky is broken and how will the other toys be able to fix her? 5. “Crying wolf” Diesel the dump truck is taught a lesson when he plays a nasty trick. 6. “Buried treasure” The toys set sail in search of buried treasure.
